info.title: PodAsk API
info.description: Transform scientific papers into interactive podcasts

post.description: Update password (requires valid access token from reset link).
Search ArXiv for papers. No auth required.

schema.title: Response Search Arxiv Api V1 Papers Search Post

post.description: Ingest a paper from ArXiv by ID and save to database.

get.description: List all papers for the current user.
Get a specific paper by ID.

post.description: Start podcast generation from papers. Returns immediately, generation happens in background.

get.description: List all podcasts for the current user.

delete.description: Delete a podcast and its segments.

get.description: Stream audio for a specific segment.

post.description: Start a new listening session for a podcast.
Update current position in listening session.
Submit a voice question (audio file). Transcribes and processes.
Process continue signal and get resume line.
